page.shortlink: api client api a5 d number namespace

property.name: decimal
property.description: The string used to represent a decimal place in a number. The default is a ".".

property.name: separator
property.description: The string used to represent a thousands place in a number. The default is a ",".

property.name: currency
property.description: The currency symbol. The default is a "$".

page.note: Any properties in this namespace can be replaced in order to support other languages or formats.
